text: Lily Serna (born 5 July 1986) is an Australian mathematician and television presenter. She is best known for co-presenting the SBS game show Letters and Numbers from 2010 until 2012 and the cooking show Destination Flavour since later 2012. Serna was born in Jerusalem. She moved to Sydney with her family when she was eight years old. Serna graduated from the University of Technology Sydney in 2009 ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Australian television presenters Category:Australian mathematicians Category:People from Sydney
title: Lily Serna
